name: Inferno - GMTK2021
description:
Game for the GMTK Jam. 

A little devil must escape from the depths of Dante's Inferno using its physical body as well as its soul. Will he be able to do it with Caronte's help? 

All programming and art has been made by Potato Games. Only music and sounds effects have been outsourced, using freesounds.org , mixkit.co and soniss.com resources.

Controls: 

WASD -> Move around 

Q -> Interact with levers 

E -> Change into spirit form 

LeftMouse -> Next Dialogue 

Space bar -> Levitate in spirit form
